name: No Way To Good
description:
This game is made for Boğaziçi Game Jam.

You play as a stressed man who wants to change the system. 

There is people out there, they take orders. Just like you. If you do not obey... 

All the assets were made by us in 48 hours:

-Ege Doğrul

-Mahmut Esat Yerlikaya

A Bukalemoon Game
